title: No, your breath control is not a "simple self-examination " of the Corona virus
subtitle: Take a deep breath and consult the CDC or other WHO directives before any "advice" of the koruna virus is followed from random sources on social media.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: If you can hold your breath without coughing, discomfort, hardness, or tight lungs, you don't suffer from fibrosis and therefore you have no COVID-19 infection.
